ISSUE.TITLE: Ghost Admin Profile Panel requesting 'null' URL for cover image
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION:
### Issue Summary The Ghost Admin dashboard is throwing a series of 301 redirects (in lieu of not finding the specified URL) when opening the [Profile] panel. Upon further inspection, the DOM shows the string "null" being escaped and printed inside `background-image: url()`. ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Start with fresh install 2. Open the Ghost admin 3. Click on the user-panel in the bottom-left corner of the screen 4. Click "Your Profile" ### Ghost Version 5.96.1 ### Node.js Version 18.20.4 ### How did you install Ghost?
